tool_description: Compares incident patterns across different time periods, departments, or organizational units to identify relative safety performance.

primary_dataset.description: Identifier for the primary dataset to compare

comparison_datasets.description: Identifiers for datasets to compare against primary

statistical_tests.description: Whether to perform statistical tests for differences

error_messages: Primary dataset not found: Ensure primary_dataset identifier is valid.
Comparison datasets not found: One or more comparison dataset identifiers are invalid.
No comparison datasets: At least one comparison dataset must be provided.
Invalid comparison metrics: Specified metrics not available in datasets.
Incompatible datasets: Datasets have incompatible structures for comparison.
Insufficient data: One or more datasets lack sufficient data for meaningful comparison.
usage: Provide primary_dataset and comparison_datasets identifiers. Specify comparison_metrics for analysis focus. Enable statistical_tests for significance testing of differences.

performance_ranking.description: Ranking of datasets from best to worst safety performance

best_performers.description: Datasets or units with best performance in each metric

improvement_opportunities.description: Areas where underperforming units could improve
